entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate if code sharing between `gtFoldExpr` and `ValueNumStore` is possible #103453
  • Add ability to output a shim .exe + .dll for an application (for WinRT activation) #103451
  • SslStreamTlsResumeTests.ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds failed in CI #103449
  • ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty failed in CI #103448
  • Re-enable System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests test project #103447
    9.0.0
  • Tests are spamming ITestOutputHelper logs for passing tests #103445
  • Can't collect the mixed mode call stack due to ambiguity of Profiler API #103443
  • Update [GeneratedRegex] analyzer/fixer for partial properties #103438
    Future
  • [8.0] "InvalidOperationException: Category does not exist" failure in net48 win x86 in System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests.PerformanceCounter_IncrementBy_IncrementBy2 #103435
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] Make CompleteWritesAsync #103434
    9.0.0
  • LdapConnection.SessionOptions.AutoReconnect throws LdapException on Linux #103431
  • [API Proposal]: CompilerLoweringPreserveAttribute #103430
    Future
  • Task Status #103428
  • R2RGetEntryPoint ETW / eventpipe event missing a size #103421
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTlsResumeTests.ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds failing on windows #103409
  • [android][apple] BinaryFormatter serialization and deserialization not supported on mobile targets #103406
  • SIGSEGV in msquic on Linux ARM32 #103404
    Future
  • Trim method names when StackTraceSupport and DebuggerSupport is false #103401
    Future
  • Fully unhandled exceptions break debugger with empty stack #103385
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected WaitForExit behavior when using cmd.exe with the start command #103384

Closed

  • GC: Enable DATAS by default #103110
    9.0.0
  • IConfiguration does not work as one would expect in .NET 8 #103418
  • Allow modification of entry assembly and probing after startup hooks are run #99883
    9.0.0
  • JSexport regression in .NET 9 SDK preview 4 #103205
    9.0.0
  • OleDb connection hangs Net6 process, fine for Net472 #82040
  • Use Python scripts to auto-generate native provider source code #88739
    9.0.0
  • Ahead-of-time compilation is not supported for the target runtime identifier 'win-x86' #103417
  • PendingAmbientTransaction exception thrown even though it was completed before #81072
  • NativeAOT staticlib crashes with SIGSEGV inside `RhpNewArray` when linked with -dead_strip #96663
    Future
  • Behavior changes with optimizations on x86 #95043
    9.0.0
  • [Performance] Regression on Fortunes - Windows #101936
  • Timeout in System.Net.Quic #101559
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional SocketsHttpHandler tests #101463
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] All runs of `POST Multipart Data` failing #103128
    9.0.0
  • Can't trace all GC allocations with ETW #101748
    9.0.0
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102772
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete ServicePointManager 🎉 #103456
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Expose the BigMul APIs publicly #103455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Set UseNativeAotForComponents to false on bionic #103454
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Validate generic constraints in ILLink tests #103452
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103446
    area-System.Security
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Mark StringContent mediaType parameters as nullable #103442
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Delete some unused cmake defines #103441
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Arm64/SVE: Implement ConvertToInt32 and ConvertToUInt32 for double #103436
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • Fix VS issue with unhandled exception on secondary threads #103425
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use ThrowHelper in Queue<T> #103424
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • RunWithFakeThreshold with DisableParallelization #103423
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move hardcoded `_BoolPropertiesThatTriggerRelinking` to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #103422
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Move type check of MD array to managed #103414
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Disable EnableWriteXorExecute by default on riscv64 architectue #103408
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP] event changes for DATAS #103405
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-1:Add native code emission module for LoongArch64 #103403
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Point to DMI.Create from RUC message on StackFrame.GetMethod #103400
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] change instructions in IMAGE_REL_LOONGARCH64_PC & fix genCodeForJumpCompare #103399
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-5:Add loongarch support in some files for LoongArch64 #103398
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-4:Add exception handling module for LoongArch64 #103397
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-3:Add method trampolines module for LoongArch64 #103396
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-2:Add instruction selection module for LoongA… #103395
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Added `Sve.LoadVectorNonTemporal/NonFaulting/128AndReplicateToVector` APIs #103392
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Produce less convoluted IR for boolean `isinst` checks #103391
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Synchronize with PR#103188 to fix the build error. #103390
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Handle more than 64 registers - The finale #103387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow gtFoldExprSpecial to handle side effects #103382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set csharp_indent_case_contents_when_block to false #103091
    area-Meta
  • Enable DATAS by default. #103374
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove the OCSP nonce #103344
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Use DynamicDependencyAttribute contructor friendly to InternalsVisibleTo when registering JSExports #103402
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Pass isOfficialBuild to AllConfigurations #103433
    Servicing-approved, blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Dispose IDisposables in RegexGenerator #103142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Update azure.storage.blob/queue and azure.identity pip install packages. #103378
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix x86 Windows legs #103411
    needs-area-label
  • [HTTP/3] Increased timeout for a slower test #103410
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ConfigXmlReader is an IDisposable; Dispose it #103163
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Dispose XmlReader in CreateRuntimeRootDescriptorFile #103239
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Dispose XMLReader after using in Xml/Utils.cs #103236
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Dedup UnboundedChannel and UnboundedPriorityChannel (#101396)" #103325
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Add LA64 targetingpacks #103272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, arch-loongarch64
  • Delete unused thread flags #103394
    area-VM-coreclr
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102960
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Disable SslStreamTlsResumeTests.(No)?ClientCert_DefaultValue_ResumeSucceeds on ARM #103359
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add new DiagnosticMethodInfo public API #103220
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update SDK to 9.0 Preview 5 #103332
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • fix hang when `prepare_to_change_heap_count` fails #103386
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adding some constant folding support for basic floating-point operations #103206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR and NativeAOT #103055
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add File.Append/WriteAllText/Bytes{Async} overloads for span/memory #103308
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2473534 #103348
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix assembly name parser to accommodate non-ASCII UTF8 strings #103363
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add JsonSchemaExporter. #103322
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [osx][linux] Make sure host symbols are copied to testhost & in-tree runtime pack #103304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add OrderedDictionary #103309
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make System.Formats.Nrbf public #103232
    area-System.Security, binary-serialization
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #103260
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [HybridGlobalization] Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • Fixing API to use in and ReadOnly as needed #103368
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Provide fix for #81093 - "Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM" #100056
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics #103318
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector extends #103370
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Dispose XmlReaders in System.Xml.Xpath.XPathNavigator #103294
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Dispose XmlReader in SchemaExporter when done #103286
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Don't report dependency on canonical forms just because there's GVMs #103331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #103372
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete -fms-extensions from coreclr native build #102834
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • clrinterp: Add missing must-expand intrinsics #103326
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882

    area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #103267
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add stress mode for skipping lowering conditional nodes to use CPU flags #103358

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't always build the runtime and fix static graph restore for BuildIntegration.proj #2613
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Centralize more toolsetversion-related data for tests #41583
  • Date Conversion problem, I spent 1 day looking for this problem, then I found out that it is in .NET 8. Converted in .NEt5 and worked fine. could not do exactly this format. (Fri Jun 14 2024 11:19:16 GMT+0500 (Узбекистан, стандартное время)) #41567

Closed

  • Select latest RTM-level SDK instead of latest SDK by default #9372
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix frameworks option forwarding for 'dotnet nuget why' #41585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41581
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet help command description #41569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enhancements to Pull Request Creation/Update in `CreateBaselineUpdatePR` Tool #41160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.6.24312.1 #41558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • update sdk preview 5 #41560
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add --rid top level option #41540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add extension WG meeting notes on type erasure codegen #8194
  • Link LDM from ref-in-async speclet #8208

Updated

  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209
  • Add extension codegen details #8121

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Outlining no longer obeys preferences #73984
  • Task List filtering for current project doesn't work as expected #73983
  • Test LanguageServerCleansUpOnUnexpectedJsonRpcDisconnectAsync failed in CI #73977

Closed

  • MemberNotNullWhen child types #73981

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit extension marker method as public #73994
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Support goto-def taking you from an interceptor method to the location being intercepted. #73992
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Fix leak of assembly metadata instances" #73991
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test #73989
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Provide a helper extension method for features like EnC to fork a solution ensuring they get up to date generated documents #73988
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploring XAML code fixes in VS #73985
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2472767 #73982
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Throw when there is a syntax version mismatch in codelens #73902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Report info diagnostic for `field` and `value` in property accessors regardless of language version #73952
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cache metadata around until it is overwritten #73990
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix error in compile loop #73976
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens to InternalTools.props in 17.6 #73986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73978
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73980
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73979
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update version for system.data.sqlclient to 4.8.6 #73975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move builds to 1ES PT #73973
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix project configuration telemetry for netframework projects #73995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #73954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add a delay for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider extension receiver conversion when reducing #73762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prefer implicit span conversions #73765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Search less projects when looking for linked documents #73939
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • asp-append-version only works for StaticFiles in wwwroot #56224
  • Connection Close Behavior on HTTP1.0 Requests #56223
  • Properties with the [DefaultValue] attribute should have a default value in the generated OpenAPI document #56215
    9.0-preview6

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #56018
  • Perf regression: mvc #56217
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56209
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextWithFilter #56112
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #56201
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #56208
  • Blazor: Error on adding new scoped CSS since last update #55998
  • Blazor WASM Msal race condition #56068

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for processing RequiredAttribute on OpenApi schemas #56225
    area-mvc, area-minimal
  • Add support for processing DefaultValueAttribute in OpenApi schemas #56219
    area-mvc

Merged

  • text fix: 'There' -> 'their' plus minor tweaks #56132
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Use 11.x version of JDK #56211
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Update Node-Externals submodule #56221
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Use new System.Net.ServerSentEvents package in SignalR #56206
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview6
  • [release/6.0] Remove unneeded publish args #56214
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.32

Updated

  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Add codefixer and completion provider to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Single File module scan takes a very long time (symbol lookup) #3737
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CodesignEntitlements doesn't seem to work in project #23045
  • XamlC error XC0009 with CommunityToolkit.Maui.Popup with Dotnet 9 Preview 5 #23042
  • PointerGestureRecognizer does not support multi touch on iOS - no individual touch / pointer information available #23041
  • Multiple project templates. The project file is being loaded all the time. You need to reopen the solution in order to work properly. #23040
  • [.NET 9.0 Preview 5] Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia uses SKBitmap and DrawBitmap, which slow down Skia hugely (should be SKImage and DrawImage) #23039
  • [Windows] GroupHeaderTemplate width smaller than ItemTemplate #23038
  • Update to .NET 8.0.60 broke custom (UraniumUI.Material) components rendering #23036
    .NET 8 SR7
  • Permissions.CheckStatusAsync not working first time #23035
  • Memory leaks when replacing Application.Current.MainPage by a new one keep the old page in memory #23034
  • Using CollectionView for a list with items that can expand/collapse on tap doesn't properly resize on iOS #23033
  • [net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak on page with CollectionView #23032
  • Android: CollectionView's ScrollTo() triggers Android warnings #23030
  • Regression Issue: CollectionView SizeChanged does not work in SR6 but it works in SR5 (.NET 8) #23029
  • Add a `TabView` control #23028
    Triaged
  • WebView crashes Maui every time the app resumes in Android with R8 enabled (Need R8 for optimization, obfuscation, and code shrinking) #23027

Closed

  • Can't build MAUI project in Release mode #22995
  • error: Failed to load AOT module 'Microsoft.Maui.Graphics' while running in aot-only mode #13882
  • TextToSpeech.GetLocalesAsync(); inconsistent values in Locale, #7813
  • RequestedThemeChanged fires at Home button press event and shows wrong RequestedTheme in iOS #15962
  • Bindings break after one throws an exception #17171
  • Item Selected from ViewModel for CollectionView De-selected automatically #15967
  • Only first Item in CollectionView is Visible on Android #17709
  • Release version of .NET MAUI 70 crashes on startup #19977
  • Ping on iOS #22783
  • Startup project crashes after splashscreen on iPadOS and .NET8.0 in release mode #21903
  • NotificationHubs Version 4.2 Runtime Error #23009
  • Android crash on navigate back from tab 2 without Shell #15687

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    community ✨
  • Update vscode extension recommendations #23044
    area-infrastructure
  • Refactor: Path.GetTempFileName() is considered insecure in certain scenarios #23037
    community ✨

Merged

  • [XC] Make assembly comparison less strict #23031
    area-xaml
  • [XC] Fix SimplifyTypeExtensionVisitor #23043
    area-xaml
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22984
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100.preview6 #23021
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area-xaml
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Add an API to allow registering TypeConverters for third-party types #21476
    area-xaml
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area-xaml
  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
    area-infrastructure, stale
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Android pan fixes #21547
    community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
    area-xaml
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Fix TapGestureRecognizer disregards parent's IsEnabled status #22578
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-theme
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When is the Find method used? #33987
  • Why does FindAsync see an entry that was deleted by ExecuteDeleteAsync? #33986
  • Unified relationship-based query tests (navigations, owned, complex...) #33985
    MQ
  • Cosmos: improve testing speed #33983
    MQ
  • Entity OwnsOne Value Object Change Tracking Problem #33981
  • How to re-use expressions in queries? #33978
  • Ability to configure DbContextOptionsBuilder via IConfigureOptions/IConfigureNamedOptions #33977

Closed

  • Cosmos: run CI tests on an emulator #18707
    MQ
  • Filtered Include for Reference Property #33982
  • SQL Server: what is the maximum supported compatibility level for EF6 (Azure SQL)? #33980
  • Is there way to create database procedure from C# #33979
  • Runtime Relational Model created for both Model and RuntimeModel? #33897

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix exception assertions in Cosmos tests #33984
  • Run Cosmos tests as a separate step #33974

Updated

  • Fix for #33702 Translation for the SQL Server PATINDEX function #33868
